txt.en:
Borne by the catapults of the Enemy, Ughâsh the Unslakable threatens to engulf the entirety of Minas Tirith in flames.

This quest starts with <rgb=#FFFF00>empty</rgb> Merit Rating.

<rgb=#00FF00>Merit Gain:</rgb>
* Defeat Ughâsh the Unslakable
* Defeat Ughâsh the Unslakable in less than 30 seconds for full merit gain
Defeat Ughâsh the Unslakable before its flames overwhelm the defenders of Minas Tirith.
<rgb=#FF0000>The Living Flame vanishes as flames engulf the First Circle of Minas Tirith!</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>Defeat DNT swiftly, before flames overwhelm the defenders of Minas Tirith</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>Defeat DNT swiftly, before flames overwhelm the defenders of Minas Tirith</rgb>
